doc.after: Communism is a political ideology that seeks to establish a future without social class or formalized state structure and with social organization based upon common ownership of the means of production It can be classified as a branch of the broader socialist movement Communism also refers to a variety of political movements which claim the establishment of such a social organization as their ultimate goal
